    • move

      public void move(int width, int height, Board board)
      The wolf follows the sheep if the sheep is on the field next to it. Otherwise, the wolf moves randomly by one step.
      Overrides:

      Parameters:

      height - Height of the board
      board - The board on which the ismulation takes place
